item.title: Move The Needle
item.description: Every morning, rolling out of bed, I ask myself the same question. “How am I going to move the needle today?” I find myself asking the same question right before falling asleep too. Now that I’m going into the office, I ask myself the same question walking through the chain fence pathway between the parking lot and my office. It’s stuck in my head and always repeating. Moving the needle means making a NOTICEABLE impact to your organization.
